traits.name: Cling to Life (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The first time Zargash would drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, he instead drops to 1 hit point.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Zargash wears a bat-shaped amulet that has the properties of a ring of feather falling.

actions.name: Warhammer
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Deathly Ray
entries: Ranged Spell atk +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 25 (4d10 + 3 damage) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zargash casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
